conclusion: Analyze the graph to determine acceleration over time and calculate speed at t=60s.
Graph shows acceleration vs. time with segments: 0-5s at 2 m/s², 5-56s at 0 m/s², 56-60s at -2 m/s².
From 0 to 5s, acceleration is 2 m/s², velocity at t=5s is 10 m/s.
From 5 to 56s, acceleration is 0 m/s², velocity remains 10 m/s.
From 56 to 60s, acceleration is -2 m/s², velocity at t=60s is 2 m/s.
